headline.main: JAPANESE AGAIN SEIZE THE INITIATIVE; Their Overland Attack On Port Moresby Is A Serious Threat

lead_paragraph: SOMEWHERE IN AUSTRALIA, Aug. 1 -- Almost the entire Southwest Pacific war area has burst into activity within the last ten days and the initiative has rested solely with the Japanese. It has been emphatically demonstrated that what is known among Americans here as the "forgotten war" is not forgotten by Tokyo.
abstract: Jap land and air activity, Australian area, discussed; map
